----------------- 1.Description -----------------
Hidden in a box of supplies ordered from far away lands, this one was hiding. You're not entirely sure who's in control. The Ghost or the Girl ?
The Hollow is a backrow healer, with a twisted twist.

----------------- 4.Changelog - important changes only - ----------------- #1.7 > CoM compatibility & balance : - As per CoM, Stress damage taken now has a minimum of 20%, Hollow can no longer be entirely immuned. - Crit effect: +20% Blight Chance (2 rds) - CRT from 4/4.5/5/5.5/6.5% to 4/5/6/7/8% - Tumor : CRT from 0/0/0/0/0 to 5/6/7/8/9%, Tumor now also contributes to stress resist stacks, blight dot +2 - Phagos : Stress heal from 8/9/10/11/12 to 6/7/8/9/10 - Fatum Nunc : Void Antibarrier duration from 16 to 8, no herbs, removed obsolete virtue debuff, stress damage received from +80% to +50%, blight dot +5
